short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Where webpages speak to you. Summarizes a Google Search result and converts it into audio using GPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience with HearMeOut by bringing the power of AI to your ears 🎧
This free extension summarizes a Google Search result and converts it to audio with a single click. 
Ideal for those who prefer listening over reading or need auditory assistance.
Under the hood, HearMeOut is powered by ChatGPT and it's text-to-speech.

----
Key Features:

1️⃣ Url to text summary: 
- Summarize any result of a Google search
- Uses AI to create a quick and concise summary

2️⃣ Text summary to audio:
- The generated summary is then converted to audio
- Uses AI to generate an accurate speech

3️⃣ One click simplicity
- Just click, wait and listen
- User friendly interface

----
Why Choose HearMeOut?

⚡ Multitasking
Perfect for grasping the essence of lengthy articles.
Ideal for anyone looking to consume information efficiently with audio.

⚡ Accessibility
A great tool for those with visual impairments or reading difficulties.
This is also ideal for accessible learning.

⚡ Powered by AI
By using advanced GPT models, we are able to provide accurate summaries.
Enjoy realistic audio that goes beyond basic text-to-speech by using OpenAI's generated voice.

⚡Transparency and safety
This free extension is open-source for complete transparency and trust.
Your API key is stored on your computer, never shared with us.

----
Support:
For questions/issues/requests related to the extension, please create an issue in the Github repository: https://github.com/BugArtisan/HearMeOut

If you appreciate this extension, consider making a donation.
Your support acknowledges the time and effort that went into creating it and motivates improvements.
=> https://www.buymeacoffee.com/bugartisan

Thank you for valuing my work 🙏
